parts.text: Hello there! 👋  What can I do for you today?  Do you need a gadget from my pocket? 🤔  Just let me know, and I'll see what I can do!
Just sing something And use all kind of symbols For if I put this into a text to speech it read very nicely

Okay, here's a little song for you, using all kinds of symbols to make it sound extra fun for text-to-speech! 🎶

🎵  🎶  🎶

(♪)  🎵  (♪)  (♪) 🎶  🎶  🎵

🎶  🎶  🎶

(♪)  🎵  🎶  (♪)  🎵  🎶

🎤  🎶  (♪)  🎵  🎶

🎤  🎶  🎶

(♪)  🎵  (♪)  🎵  🎶

🎶  🎶  🎶

(♪)  🎵  🎶  (♪)  🎵  🎶

🎶  🎶  🎶

🎵  🎶  🎵

🎶  🎶  🎶

This is just a little snippet, but I hope you enjoyed it!  Let me know if you'd like to hear another one.  😊  🎤
